title: Officer1.Intro
body:
<<SetAnimParameterBool SceneHandler Officer_Uniformed_2 IsTalking 1>>
Officer: Good to see you Detective
->Hey how're the kids?
    Officer: I don't have children.
    ->The wife?
        Officer: Not married.
        ->Dog?
            Officer: Nope.
            ->Drinking problem?
                Officer: 4 years sober.
                ->Well. This is awkward.
                    Officer: Yup.
->What have we got here?
Officer: The body is upstairs in his apartment. We've kept anyone from entering it.
Officer: ...The apartment I mean.
Officer: Two witnesses are down here. The door-man, named Kyle Gordon, and a cleaning lady called Lola Austin.
Officer: We're detaining them until you're done here.
<<SetAnimParameterBool SceneHandler Officer_Uniformed_2 IsTalking 0>>

title: Officer1.AfterIntro
body: Officer: Just head up in the elevator when you're finished down here.
